data.title: 2024 Emerging Teen Writing and Publishing Camp
data.meta_description: 2024 My Word Publishing Writing Camp and Anthology Calling all young writers who love the craft. Let’s Dream. Create. Edit. Design and Publish a Book. My Word Publishing presents an Emerging Teen Authors Writing and Publishing Camp this Summer 2024 for teen writers. In this five-session camp, (plus office hours with the editor and book […]
data.text:
The first two camp anthology, A Thousand Feelings: An Anthology of Story Nuggets by Young Writers, and Other Realities: A Collection of Fantasy, Fiction, and Something in Between by Young Writers, each won a first place gold EVVY award in juvenile fiction from the Colorado Independent Publishers Association.

Windy City Reviews in Chicago called the stories by young authors in “Other Realities” “wonderful glimpses” into their writing futures.

“These stories gave me such hope for our next generation of authors…This would be a perfect book in a middle school library to serve as inspiration for kids who lack the confidence to write and to prove that writing is meant to be shared.”—Windy City Reviews

The third anthology, Was it Really My Fault launched on Amazon in fall 2022.
